projects.title: Survey Designer
projects.content: Survey Designer is a single page app for constructing your own forms that can be loaded on FTOpen apps through PCAPI.

projects.title: Energy Archipelago
projects.content: Energy Archipelago is a map viewer of community owned renewable energy projects across the world.

projects.title: Wordpress Mapbox
projects.content: Wordpress Mapbox is a wordpress plugin for CRUD mapbox layers and visualizing them in 3 ways: checkboxes/radios, timeline, opacity control.

projects.title: Fieldtrip Open
projects.content: Fieldtrip Open Fieldtrip-Open is a platform for developing mobile mapping and data collection apps. This framework has been used in the creation of other production strength apps e.g. the FieldtripGB, FieldtripOSM. The framework is based on Cordova framework and can be compiled to Android and iOS and potentially all other platforms targeted by Cordova. Plugins have already been written for capturing GPS tracks, geocoding, caching off-line maps, creating Geo-Fences, overlaying layers in MBTiles and KML Format, extending the records with sensor data, making decision tree questionnaires and syncing data on the cloud.

projects.title: PCAPI
projects.content: Personal Cloud API>/a> is a web application for synchronizing personal data with different cloud storage providers. Currently it is working with Dropbox and is used on Fieldtrip GB for synchronizing forms and data between a mobile app called FieldtripGB and a web app called FieldtripGB Author.

projects.title: FieldTripGB Author
projects.content: FieldTripGB Author is a web application for the generation of forms for many kinds of mobile data collection projects. The application uses the dropbox SDK for synchonizing the result with the personal dropbox account of the user.

projects.title: CENSUS UK DATA SERVICE
projects.content: UK CENSUS is a web service for downloading open data such as boundaries and postcode data of the UK.

projects.title: Cartogrammar
projects.content: Cartogrammar is a web service with which you can create a cartogram by uploading a shapefile. An API is also provided for developers and a widget for simple users that want to embed the cartogram generator at their website.

projects.title: LocateIt
projects.content: LocateIt is a web service that was created for touristic purposes. It is actually a web map service with which you can map Points of Interest (POI), categorize them, evaluate them, comment them and connect them with social media, images, videos and panoramic photos. It is also a mapping calendar. You can map events. So the users can see where the event takes place. It is a nice idea funded by the EU. It works on tablets and mobile devices as well and it also has a CMS on the backend where you can handle all the data.

projects.title: Thematic Mapper
projects.content: Thematic Mapper is a web service for creating thematic maps on the web. It is connected to UKBorders and OpenBoundaries datasets. You can upload a csv, which you can connect it to the datasets that I described before and you can create thematic maps with the value you will select. You can customize your maps by chancing colours.

projects.title: Scottish Gazetteer
projects.content: In this role I am responsible for all stages of development of the official Placename Gazetteer for Scotland, according to INSPIRE requirements.
